name: closeOnClick
description: Determines if the drop should close when an item is clicked.

name: id
description: The element ID of the filter.

name: isToggle
description: Determines if the filter is a binary toggle.

name: isToggleActive
description: Determines if the toggle is active.

name: raw
description: Determines if the filter has a raw appearance.

name: hasActiveState
description: Determines if the filter has an active state (e.g. if one or more items are selected).

name: selectedItemNames
description: The names of the selected items.
